name: Birkenstock Gizeh Leather Sandals - Women's
description: Supportive versions of your favourite flip-flops, these sandals are ready for the long haul. Whether you pair them with a thick wool sweater and jeans or something dressier, they deliver the same flexible, support, so you can walk all over town then join a sunset dance party.Smooth, soft and durable leather.Adjustable strap with buckle.Soft anatomically shaped cork latex core between jute layers for stability and moisture management.Suede leather lining provides a nice climate for your feet.Footbed edge is slightly raised to protect your feet from toe-stubbing.Toe bar guides your toes into place and promotes natural steps.EVA outsole for lightweight durability and absorbing shocks.
